Description: Red pottery shabti of It-ntr Priest of Amun Mut-... with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with black painted eyes and parallel hands in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a black painted representation of a seed-basket.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013/14 Sept-Aug, Albany NY, Albany Institute of History & Art, From the Nile to the Hudson:The story of Ankhefenmut
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
